content.text:
# Black Reel Awards of 2010

The 2010 Black Reel Awards, which annually recognize and celebrate the achievements of black people in feature, independent and television films, took place in Washington, D.C., on February 12, 2010. Precious took home a record-breaking 7 wins, with The Princess and the Frog taking home two awards.
Winners and nominees
Winners are listed first and highlighted in bold.
{| class=wikitable width="100%"
! width="50%"|  Best Film
! width="50%"| Best Director
|-
| valign="top" |
* Precious
** American Violet
** The Blind Side
** Invictus
** The Princess and the Frog
| valign="top" |
* 'Lee Daniels – Precious'
** Bill Duke – Not Easily Broken
** Spike Lee – Passing Strange
** Scott Sanders – Black Dynamite
** George Tillman Jr. – Notorious
|-
! width="50%"| Best Actor
! width="50%"| Best Actress
|-
| valign="top" |
* 'Morgan Freeman – Invictus'
** Quinton Aaron – The Blind Side
** Jamie Foxx – The Soloist
** Souléymane Sy Savané – Goodbye Solo
** Denzel Washington – The Taking of Pelham 123
| valign="top" |
* 'Gabourey Sidibe – Precious'
** Nicole Beharie – American Violet
** Taraji P. Henson – I Can Do Bad All By Myself
** Sophie Okonedo – Skin
** Maya Rudolph – Away We Go
|-
! width="50%"| Best Supporting Actor
! width="50%"| Best Supporting Actress
|-

** Charles S. Dutton – American Violet
** Chiwetel Ejiofor – 2012

** Derek Luke – Madea Goes to Jail
| valign="top" |
* '''Mo'Nique – Precious'
** Mariah Carey – Precious
** Paula Patton – Precious

** Alfre Woodard – American Violet

** Keith David – The Princess and the Frog

** Forest Whitaker – Where the Wild Things Are
|-
! width="50%"| Best Breakthrough Performance
! width="50%"| Best Ensemble

* 'Gabourey Sidibe – Precious'
** Quinton Aaron – The Blind Side

| valign="top" |

! colspan="2" width="100%"| Best Original or Adapted Song
|-
| colspan="2" valign="top" |
* '"Almost There" from The Princess and the Frog – Anika Noni Rose'
** "Down in New Orleans" from The Princess and the Frog – Anika Noni Rose
** "I Can Do Bad All By Myself" from I Can Do Bad All By Myself – Mary J. Blige
** "Keys" from Passing Strange'' – Daniel Breaker and De'Adre Aziza
** "Never Knew I Needed" from The Princess and the Frog – Ne-Yo

** Sugar – Anna Boden and Ryan Fleck
** This is the Life – Ava DuVernay
| valign="top" |
